titleStmt.title: The rarities of Russia with the interest of England in point of trade with that country which occasioned the magnificent entertainments of the Russian ambassadours, 1. by Queen Elizabeth, anno 1589, 2. by King James, November 5, 1617, 3. by King Charles the Second, 1662, which are here described / by Will. White merchant.
titleStmt.author: White, Will. (William), merchant.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 7-8, 21-24 ommited in numbering only.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
